16492:
How clean &
pretty!

Let's go to
another area.
16636:
Entrance Door

Be sure that
this area is clean.
16696:
Tray Bin

Check the tray bins
and replace the
trash bags if you
need to.
16784:
Baby Chair

Wipe the seat and
table with a clean
counter cloth.
16872:
The Floors

Pick up trash you
see and sweep up
dust with a broom.
16964:
Wet Floor Sign

Clean dirty floors
with a mop.
Put out the
wet floor sign.
17064:
Table

If customers left
trays out, pick
them up and
wipe the table.
17172:
Tap areas you
should clean.
You will learn
what to do there.
17304:
How clean &
pretty!

Let's go to
another area.
17512:
Car Park

Sweep up dirt
with a broom.
17620:
Entrance Door

Be sure that
this area is clean.
17684:
Windows

Spray McDonald's
cleaner (12 times
diluted) & clean.
17752:
Dumpster

Carry trash to the
dumpster. Don't
drag the bag!
17828:
Tray Bin

Check the tray bins
and replace the
trash bags if you
need to.
17944:
How clean &
pretty!

Let's go to
another area.
18200:
Tap START! to begin
the training.
18312:
Urinal

Wear gloves to
clean the toilet
bowl.
18368:
Trash Can

Check the trash
bag and replace
if needed.
18436:
Wet Floor Sign

Put out the wet
floor sign when
mopping.
18512:
Mirror & Sink

Wipe up dirt and
water splashes.
Refill the soap.
18592:
Toilet Paper

Check the toilet
paper and refill
if needed.
18676:
Toilet Bowl

Spray restroom
cleaner, scrub with
brush and rinse.
